priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C120527

self.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the microbiology test codes of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model.
name: Microbiology Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of any rod-shaped bacteria that resist decolorizing by acid after accepting an aqueous stain solution, due to the mycolic acids in their cell walls.
A measurement of the influenza A antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the influenza A/B antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the influenza B antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms assignable to the Mycobacterium tuberculosis species in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms assignable to the Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex in a biological specimen.
The identification of the type of a viral organism in a biological specimen.
